SEARCH
Package uk.ac.aber.cs21120.knockout.interfaces

Interface ITreeNode

All Known Implementing Classes:
TreeNode
public interface ITreeNode
This interface must be implemented by classes representing nodes in the binary tree of teams that makes up the competition. Implementing classes must also have constructor which takes the left child node, the right child node, and a team to set (any of these can be null). For example, TreeNode(ITree left, ITree right, ITeam t). Note that these must be the *interfaces*, not the implementing classes.
